The correct answer is B.

Here's why:

Starting from the left, we have a small dark triangle. If we apply the O operator (duplicates circles), it will become a large dark triangle. Then, if we apply the P operator (changes shading and shape of all figures), it will become a large light triangle. So, the output after the first two operators would be:

| small dark triangle | | large light triangle |

Next, if we apply the O operator again (duplicates circles), it will become a large dark triangle. Then, if we apply the P operator, it will become a small dark triangle. So, the output after the third operator would be:

| large dark triangle | | small dark triangle |

Finally, if we apply the O operator again (duplicates circles), it will become a small light triangle. Then, if we apply the P operator, it will become a small light triangle. So, the final output would be:

| large dark triangle | | small light triangle |
| small dark triangle | | small light triangle |

Therefore, the correct answer is:

B - | small dark triangle | | large dark triangle | | small light triangle |
